overview: Sean Greene was the founder and CEO of the Away Travel Network (including Gorp.com, Away.com, OutsideOnline.com), the leading online publisher for specialty and niche travel, which he sold to Orbitz. He is currently a co-founder and managing director of Rock Creek Ventures. Mr. Greene also served as a senior engagement manager at McKinsey & Co, serving clients in the telecom and technology industries. He received an MBA from the Yale School of Management and an AB from Princeton University, and was named a Fulbright Scholar at the National University of Singapore.
